Argumento: Renata (Yanet Sedano) a young woman who wakes up with a mysterious telephone with thousands of numbers, her mission will be to reach the end and discover the meaning that could change her destiny.

In this neo-American western, Joel returns home to avenge the death of his first love. Searching for retribution in the decaying landscape of his childhood, he soon learns that closure cannot be found through acts of violence.
Mary is a young woman who will be operated on her back, something goes wrong, leading her to a near death experience.

Nombre de la película: Para eso estamos a las vecinas

Argumento: Before it Begins is a short story about a young women, Vee, surviving in a relationship with signs of both physical and mental abuse. The story takes us through one whole day, from morning to night, as Vee endures, and tries to overlook, various forms of abuse from her partner Alfred.
A young man is confronted by local parents at a soccer game, because his little sister is the only girl in the league.
A man wakes up alone in the woods, chained to a tree. He now question his sanity.
Trapped in a lift, a man and woman are forced to confront each other about the night they first met.

A group of heist-men kill each other in a double cross. Reece a young man finds the case. Walker and Engle two killers who were in on the heist try to find the case with transmitters they had placed in the case.

Black Spider: The Origins of Eric Needham is an adaptation of DC Comics' masked crusader, The Black Spider, which was created in the late 1970's. This piece is meant to serve as a fan fiction film and used strictly for promotion purposes only.
Nombre de la película: Black Spider: The Origins of Eric Needham

Argumento: A coming-of-age story that follows Jude, a teenager struggling with loneliness after moving to a new city. He starts taking driving lessons in a bid to fit in but soon discovers that true and meaningful connection can sometimes be found in the most unexpected of places.

After the death of his father, the once rich and popular star athlete; 18 year old Jordan Marino begins to struggle with a new way of life in the local trailer park as he struggles to come to terms with his sexual identity.
After a failed suicide on Christmas Eve, an ex-gangster goes to a gas station where he involuntarily becomes involved with an innocent murder.
A teenage boy who is bullied by his classmates, to re-earn his lost identity, does actions that he once refrained from, and tries to prove himself through making changes in his behavior.
The tale on how a young upcoming boxer turns and becomes one of the most notorious gangsters.
Nader, a young man in his twenties, and Abu Melhem Al-Turathi in the late sixties. The events between them will take us and show us the difference between the old generation and the new generation.

A movie theater in Kitakyushu City. Projectionist Kenichi is forced to close his cinema due to the COVID-19 pandemic and falls into depression, causing his wife Yoshie to worry. One day, Kenichi decides to take a positive step forward.
When two ex-lovers sit down over a meal, one of them bites off more than they can chew.

The day before the start of a new school term, 17 year-old Hedi discovers that he has to change his surname, by order of the administrative authorities. The news acts as a catalyst, provoking an intense self-questioning.

We look at the story of two young people who couldn't stand the idea of spending the first lockdown in Manila alone, so they decide to throw caution to the wind and move in together. Stuck in a house and in a new relationship, they explore each other's taste and learn about each other in the process.
During the course of a conversation between two people, some terrible secrets are revealed. What will truly be the fate of all those involved? Winner of "Best Indie Film" at 2021 FilmCon

Sometimes we are frightened by new situations in life and find it hard to accept when something is over and something completely new is waiting for us. Christmas is always an emotional time, especially for a family facing change.

What began as a healthy relationship gradually turns into torment due to drug use, alcohol and pathological jealousy. It is the true story of a young woman who, after being a victim of domestic violence by her lover who constantly manipulates her with the phrase ''Nobody will love you like me... '', decides to break chains definitively and escape from the hell that co... Read all
An astronomy teacher must confront her own failures while trying to help a student struggling with Zoom classes.
A defeated Cavalier Captain flees victorious Roundheads in the aftermath of the Battle of Marston Moor.
Faced with the prospect of trying to apologize to his mother, following completion of a recovery program, Danny finds himself burdened with his own doubt.
No matter what part of the world you are from, we can ALL use some HumaniTEA.
Shortly after his father's death, Ismael attends a group therapy session. There, he'll meet a person that could change the way he sees his grief and even his life.
A criminal in-hiding, reminiscences of his hometown.
Four troubled, interesting, and homeless strangers must group together in order to get a home.

A religious man joins a video conferencing call with other bipolar content creators only to find his sanity, patience, and beliefs pushed to the limit. This short film is an adaptation of the feature length stage play, A Bipolar Philosophy, and has been subtitled Philosophy One to indicate that it is the first installment in a larger film project.
In the moments after his death, Levi faces a choice that could change his life forever.
A young switchboard operator must focus on her job as she overhears an unexpected event unfold.
Two sisters uncover a secret dimension in their household attic.
Two drunk friends encounter a damaged former child star at a laundromat. There, they learn of her troubling life.
A young man moves up a mountain to find a very specific sort of tree, that he needs for his work. Once there, he meets another man who's had an accident.

She is a young, aspiring soccer player who is madly in love with the Indian women's soccer team's player "Ngangom Bala Devi" and aspires to play for the Indian soccer team. When the football association discovers her name in a transgender NGO, she is suspended. Such a hidden truth about Paul's sexual identity stops her dream, in which she becomes trapped in a seemingl... Read all

In a desperate attempt at regaining her husband's interest, a conventional marriage advice columnist decides to become more like her husband's edgy secret girlfriend by attending her tattoo parlor and becoming her client.

Nine-year-old Orthodox Jewish Etel is having her period for the first time. Miriam, her mother, finally regards her as a woman. Etel is thrilled, until she finds out that in her religion women are unclean when they have their period.
The Virgin. The Lover. And a Vegas motel room. The year is 1985, its Tea and Milk's wedding night, and it's time to "seal the deal" - making this an unusually charged - First date.

One day one of my doctor friends shared a shocking and at the same time interesting memory with me. It happened when he was a supervisor in one of the hospitals in Yazd during Covid-19 quarantine. I couldn't stop thinking about that memory and I finally decided to make a short film inspired by it. We all know the hard work they did, but my film shows the suffering and... Read all

A piece of digital spoken word, exploring the identity of Palestinian diaspora in Scotland capturing intricate balance between nostalgic romanticism of a homeland and bleak and dangerous reality of the oppression of Palestinians.
Nombre de la película: Said the Dove to the Olive Tree

Argumento: A 30 seconds super short film about manliness: Alexander tries a Sex Game with Hanna but it doesn't really go as planned. Made for the International mens day 19/11 2021 as a call to start problematising and defining the male gender role so it will be possible to break out of male toxicity and to redefine one's role for a more equal home/relation/society.
